name: NBCNews
text:
President Trump signs executive orders for coronavirus relief after negotiations with Democrats in Congress reach an impasse.

Democrats have promised to file a legal challenge, citing Congress' constitutional authority to determine federal spending. https://t.co/QNnQbpLfMU

name: NBCNews
text: WATCH: Protesters and security forces clash in Beirut as demonstrators gathered Saturday amid mounting fury over the massive explosion that devastated much of the city and killed nearly 160 people. https://t.co/2bPC7bqWJ3 https://t.co/DupKR81sjL
